2018-07-23 06:49:50.609731: W tensorflow/core/framework/op_kernel.cc:1318] OP_REQUIRES failed at cwise_ops_common.cc:70 : Resource exhausted: OOM when allocating tensor with shape[88] and type float on /job:localhost/replica:0/task:0/device:GPU:0 by allocator GPU_0_bfc

It will basically print this sort of thing over and over for 10 minutes before the ResourceExhaustedError is caught & I can clear the Tensorflow session and resume training a different model. Since I'm trying out a variety of models, some don't work because they don't fit on the GPU. That's fine, so I just catch the error and try a different model. Ideally the recovery from this could be much faster, and there would be some way to minimize the printed logs and resume immediately.

It will basically print this sort of thing over and over for 10 minutes before the ResourceExhaustedError is caught & I can clear the Tensorflow session and resume training a different model. Since I'm trying out a variety of models, some don't work because they don't fit on the GPU. That's fine, so I just catch the error and try a different model. Ideally the recovery from this could be much faster, and there would be some way to minimize the printed logs and resume immediately.
